Home.title: OpenClaw
Home.description: OpenClaw aggregates installation, model configuration, chat integration, web search, and skills into a guided path.

hero.title: Make {name} accessible to everyone
hero.subtitle: Install, connect models, integrate chat tools, enable web search, and add skills ? all in one guided path.

features.title: Why OpenClaw
features.description: All-platform access, extensible skills, and ownership of your data.

platform.title: All-platform access
platform.description: Connect to Feishu, DingTalk, and more ? continuously expanding.

skills.title: Skill expansion
skills.description: Official and community skills with one-click install.

ownership.title: Data ownership
ownership.description: Self-hosted, permissioned, and secure by design.

steps.title: Build in 5 steps
steps.description: Follow the path and dive into details whenever you need.

install.title: Install
install.description: Official, Alibaba Cloud, and Tencent Cloud install guides.

tabs.title: Official install guide
tabs.description: OpenClaw official documentation and setup steps.

tabs.title: Alibaba Cloud install guide
tabs.description: Lightweight server deployment on Alibaba Cloud.

tabs.title: Tencent Cloud install guide
tabs.description: Lightweight server deployment on Tencent Cloud.

models.title: Configure models
models.description: Claude, Codex, Alibaba Cloud, and proxy APIs.

tabs.title: Claude
tabs.description: Set API keys and select the Claude model preset.

tabs.title: Codex
tabs.description: Connect Codex for coding workflows and agents.

tabs.title: Alibaba & Proxy
tabs.description: Configure Alibaba Cloud or proxy APIs for routing.

chat.title: Connect chat tools
chat.description: Integrate Feishu, DingTalk, and enterprise chat tools.

tabs.title: Feishu
tabs.description: Create a bot, configure callbacks, and test events.

tabs.title: DingTalk
tabs.description: Set permissions and verify signature handling.

webSearch.title: Enable web search
webSearch.description: Web Search Browser with safe proxy and caching.

tabs.title: Built-in
tabs.description: Enable Web Search Browser and test a query.

tabs.title: Custom search
tabs.description: Connect your own search endpoint or engine.

tabs.title: Safe proxy
tabs.description: Add rate limits, caching, and safe proxy rules.

skills.title: Add skills
skills.description: Access skill marketplace and private skills.

tabs.title: Official
tabs.description: Install curated skills with trusted defaults.

tabs.title: Community
tabs.description: Browse community skills and check permissions.

tabs.title: Private
tabs.description: Ship internal skills with scoped access.

skills.title: Skill scenarios
skills.description: Pick a category and launch quickly.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem & integrations
ecosystem.description: Works with popular models and collaboration platforms.

safety.title: Security notice
safety.description: We have observed malicious third-party skills in the wild. Always review the source code before installing, and prefer official or audited community skills.
